Cleaning Out the Circulatory System Through Chelation Therapy

September 20, 2013 by sagenaturalhealing

0

Chelation therapy is a safe and effective method for removing toxins and metabolic wastes from the bloodstream. The word chelation comes from the Greek word chele meaning “to claw” or “to bind.” Chelating agents administered intravenously or orally have been proven to increase blood flow and remove arterial plaque. The treatment is frequently (although not in Canada) administered by doctors to help reverse arteriosclerosis, prevent heart attacks and strokes, and is used as an alternative to bypass surgery and angioplasty. The benefits of using an oral chelating agent, such as Nature’s Sunshine’s MC (Mega Chelation), is the convenience of taking a tablet verses intravenous injection and the long term health benefits that can be derived from taking an oral supplement as part of one’s daily vitamin regime.

 Reference:  Two-time Nobel Prize winner, Dr. Linus Paulin:  “Chelation therapy is far safer and much less expensive than surgical treatment of atherosclerosis. Chelation therapy might eliminate the need for bypass surgery and is equally valid when used as a preventative treatment”.

We are all exposed to metals in some form: foods, water, dental amalgams, environmental contaminants and in some vaccines.  Some people also accumulate metals in their tissues more readily than others and are less able to excrete them naturally.  Many symptoms and conditions are associated with heavy metal toxicity, including the following:

  1. Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
  2. Atherosclerosis
  3. Multiple Sclerosis
  4. Immune system weaknesses
  5. Benign prostatic Hypertrophy
  6. Environmental or chemical sensitivities (allergies)
  7. Hypothyroidism
  8. Migraines
  9. Immune system weaknesses
  10. Blood sugar irregularities
  11. Mood disorders

 Benefits of chelation

  • Reduction of liver-produced cholesterol
  • Lowered insulin requirements in diabetics
  • Lowered blood cholesterol levels
  • Reduced high blood pressure
  • Normalization of cardiac arrhythmias
  • Relief from leg muscle cramps
  • Reduction in allergic symptoms
  • Normalized weight
  • Improved psychological and emotional status
  • Enhanced sensory input: better sight, hearing, taste
  • Fewer excessive heart contractions
  • Lessened varicose vein pigmentation
  • Lightened age spots
  • Fewer aches and pains, arthritic and otherwise
  • Less reliance on pain medication
  • Hair loss stopped and reversed
  • Reversal of impotence
  • Alzheimer’s Disease symptoms reversed
  • Reduced need for duiretics
  • Cold extremities warmed
  • Chronic Fatigue Syndrome overcome
  • Memory, and mental concentration improved
  • Post-cataract surgery vision loss restored
  • Cosmetic changes, including more lustrous hair, added eye sparkle, stronger unsplit nails, better skin color, fewer visible wrinkles and a more youthful appearance.

Nature’s Sunshine Chelation Program – MC:   MC is an oral chelation formula used to strip plaque from artery walls to improve circulation; aiding the body in dealing with symptoms of hardening of the arteries such as poor circulation, absent mindedness, wounds that won’t heal in extremities, fatigue and heart disease while removing heavy metals from the system.  The vitamins and minerals in MC combine with metals in the bloodstream and are removed from the body by the liver and kidneys and excreted; helping with diabetes, failing eyesight, macular degeneration and varicose veins.

Chelation Program – General Instructions:  It is very important to start slowly with this program and work up as instructed. Otherwise, symptoms, such as nausea, dizziness, headaches and skin eruptions, may occur. It is also important to taper off as instructed, or fatigue and temporary nutritional deficiencies may result.

Working Up to Full Dose:  For the first week, take the following with breakfast and dinner.

  • 1 tablet of MC twice daily
  • Each week increase the dosage of MC by 1 tablet.
  • Hence, the second week, take 2 tablets of MC twice daily.

Full Program:  A full dose of MC is 4-6 tablets twice daily, depending on body weight. Large persons should take the full 6 tablets per day. Small persons should take 4 tablets 2x per day. Individuals of average height and weight should find 5 tablets 2x per day (for a total of 10 per day) sufficient. When you reach full dose, you will be taking 4-6 MC tablets with breakfast and dinner.

You will need to stay on this full dose for a minimum of 1 month for each ten years of your age. Thus, if you are 40 you need to stay on the full dose for at least 4 months, 6 months if you are 60, etc.

Tapering Off:   It is important to taper off in a similar manner to building up. On the full program you are taking very large doses of certain vitamins and minerals, and the body gets lazy about extracting them from food.  If you quit all at once, your body may experience a sudden drop in nutrient levels until it readjusts to absorbing these vitamins and minerals from food.

Taper off by reducing the amount you take by two tablets each week. After the program is complete, some people use MC as their daily vitamin and mineral supplement by taking two tablets per day.

Cleansing Reactions:   As the body removes the plaque from the walls of the arteries, the cholesterol level in the blood will temporarily rise. This is normal. The kidneys and liver will remove the calcium, cholesterol and other impurities from the body. If there are indications that these organs are weak it may be necessary to give them extra support:

Additional Supplements to support the body in elimination:  Nature’s Sunshine Mineral Chi Tonic, To support the Liver and Kidneys – Nature’s Sunshine K-C / KB-C or Milk Thistle

References:  Today’s Herbal Health, Louise Tenney, M.H.; Nutritional Herbology, A reference Guide to Herbs, Mark Pedersen; www.naturessunshine.ca

Echinacea – Natures Immunity Booster (antiseptic, antiviral, blood purifier)

March 30, 2013 by sagenaturalhealing

0

Echinacea Flower, Gold River British Columbia (image courtesy of West Coast 68 Photography)

It’s that time of year and there seems to be an abundance of colds and flues going around. There are numerous natural options that not only combat pathogens (virus, bacteria, parasites) directly, but also support the body’s immune system to help fight cold and flu. Exposure to these viruses is unavoidable, but there are ways you can protect yourself. We all know that good hand washing hygiene, adequate sleep, exercise and stress management are fundamental to maintaining a healthy immune system and fighting infection and disease. If you begin to feel run-down or if a cold or flu seems to be taking hold, slow down – listen to your body – get extra rest and take something to boost your immune system and support your body in a faster recovery.

The most well known benefit and action of Echinacea is its ability to help boost the body’s immune system and shorten the duration of the common cold or flu. It will not completely prevent individuals from getting a cold or flu, but studies have proven that it can help to lessen the severity and duration of the illness . Echinacea benefits the body by strengthening both the immune and lymphatic systems; blood is cleaned of many encumbrances that may lead to health issues later. Echinacea does its job without side effects and the advantages of using it to enhance the immune response is that, unlike most drugs used for that purpose, it is nontoxic.

Echinacea has a long history of medicinal use, the Native Americans of the prairies used Echinacea for medicinal purposes more than any other plant; it was highly regarded and used more than any other herb for illness and injury. Echinacea is considered a powerful blood purifier and can help the body fight against strep and staph infections and is known to help the body fight against chemical toxic poisoning.

Benefits and Uses:

  • Stimulates the immune system and strengthens the immune response against bacterial, viral and fungal infections, especially of the respiratory and digestive systems .
  • Echinacea has traditionally been used to fight off colds, flues and infections and for the relief of sore throat due to colds. It also acts as supportive therapy in the treatment of colds, flus, upper respiratory infections and urinary infections.

Natures Sunshine carries Echinacea & Golden Seal (both capsule and liquid form) and Echinacea, Ultimate Extract. Golden seal root contains powerful alkaloids like berberine and hydrastine to help the body maintain strong immune defense; so combined with Echinacea creates a powerful support supplement as both herbs exhibit anti-microbial and anti-bacterial properties.

If you have any further questions or would like to inquire about Natures Sunshine productions, please feel free to contact me, I would be happy to help!

References: (1) Today’s Herbal Health, The Essential Reference Guide 6th Edition, Louise Tenney, MH; (2) Nutritional Herbology, A Reference Guide to Herbs, Mark Pedersen

Chromium; Diabetes and Weighloss

March 23, 2013 by sagenaturalhealing

1

Scientists know that chromium is part of the glucose tolerance factor (GTF).  The glucose tolerance factor helps turn carbohydrates into glucose, an important energy source.   The North American diet (yes this includes both Canada and the United States), are deficient in Chromium and many other minerals.  This lack of Chromium may contribute to the estimated two out of three North Americans that have been diagnosed hypoglycemic, perhypoglycemic or diabetic.

The lack of Chromium in our soil and water supply effects the body’s ability to maintain normal blood sugar levels; further aggravated by a diet high in refined sugar, flour and junk food.

Along with hypoglycemia, perhypoglycemia and diabetes, Chromium deficiency can also lead to fatigue, glucose intolerance and an increased risk of arteriosclerosis.

Chromium works by facilitating the hormone insulin, which helps to control blood glucose levels. If you don’t have enough insulin or if your body is resistant to it’s effects, you can eat plenty of food but still not be able to use it as energy. This is the mechanism behind diabetes, which is characterized by an inability to produce or use insulin.  Chromium works with insulin to help metabolize sugars and may help to relieve symptoms of hypoglycemia.  It may also help in the repair of cell walls and help to prevent people with mild glucose intolerance from developing diabetes.

Natures Sunshine carries Chromium GTF.   It is a high quality supplement, reasonably priced and when taken as instructed has a good chance of helping individuals control blood sugar levels and aid in weightloss.

If you have any further questions or would like to inquire about Natures Sunshine productions, please feel free to contact me, I would be happy to help!

Stinging Nettle – Natures Cleanser

March 23, 2013 by sagenaturalhealing

0

Cleansing is part of Nature’s program. Did you know that both dandelion and stinging nettles are wonderful liver/kidney/urinary tract cleansers? Both are among the first spring greens to emerge in the springtime. Traditionally, after winter where dried meats, fats and long sorted fruits and grains were the main diet items, these spring greens, as well as being loaded with essential vitamins and minerals, served to cleanse the liver and kidneys of built up of toxins from the winter diet and closed in environment. For an added boost, when you are out wandering in your garden or the fields, consider picking a few leaves and making a cup of cleansing tea.  (by Marilyn Hargreaves, Eclipse Holistic Health Solutions)
